Subject to availability and blackout dates. Taxes and gratuities are not included. AAA card required at check-in. Book Now Top Reasons to Stay 
Located on the Beach

You'll be steps from six miles of pristine and expansive South Carolina coastline. Perfect for catching the morning sunrise, kayaking and paddle boarding, ocean swimming, and day after day of beachfront bliss.

The Best Value in Isle of Palms

You’ll save money while enjoying Isle of Palms’ best vacation value. Scroll up to see our best offers and discounts! Best of all, you can change or cancel your stay, penalty-free, up to 24 hours before your scheduled arrival.

Next Door to The Windjammer

You can’t get any closer to Isle of Palms’ most iconic beach bar and live music club! For a half-century, The Windjammer has been IOP’s stay-all-day gathering place for music, food, and laid-back fun.

Walk to Nearby Restaurants & Bars

You can take an easy stroll to Isle of Palms’ best restaurants, shops, and watering holes. Check out a few of our nearby favorites on our page.
Things To Do 
Short Drive to Downtown Charleston

You’ll be just minutes from Charleston’s landmarks, restaurants, and attractions, making it easy to take a break from the beach for a Lowcountry dinner, a horse-drawn carriage tour, or a shopping trip along King Street.

[Page Title: Isle of Palms Hotels | Official Website | Seaside Inn]

SKIP TO CONTENT Your Easy Beach Escape 
Welcome to Seaside Inn

A beach lover’s dream getaway. Located in the heart of Isle of Palms, nextdoor to the Windjammer, and just minutes from Charleston, Seaside Inn is a 51-room boutique beachfront hotel embracing the casual come-as-you-are vibe local to the area. Featuring direct access to the beach, unbeatable proximity to local restaurants and bars, and comfortable guest rooms with ocean views, Seaside Inn offers exceptional value on South Carolina’s Lowcountry coast.
Explore Our Offers 
Reasons To Stay

Oceanfront Rooms

Wake up to stunning ocean views and the soothing sounds of the coast right outside your window. Relax and unwind with a front-row seat to one of South Carolina’s most sought-out beaches.
View Rooms 
Reasons To Stay

Isle of Palms For Less

Enjoy the beauty of Isle of Palms for less. Offering affordable beachfront accommodations, book a great value stay without sacrificing on comfort or location.
View Offers 
Reasons To Stay

Local Drinks & Dining

From casual bites to coastal cocktails, delicious options await along Ocean Boulevard just steps from our lobby. Ask the front desk about local dining deals - we know the place for you!
Explore 
Reasons To Stay

Walking Distance to The Windjammer

Catch live music and embrace the island vibe at The Windjammer, located next door. Enjoy the tunes without worrying about the drive back.
Explore 
Reasons To Stay

A Short Drive From Downtown

Get the most out of your trip and explore the historic charm of downtown Charleston just minutes away. Discover shops, dining, and cultural attractions while staying close to the beach.
Explore 
Reasons To Stay

Bring Your Furry Friends

Seaside Inn is the only pet-friendly hotel in the heart of Isle of Palms. Book your trip and make memories with the whole family, paws and all.
View Rooms

Sullivan’s Island Isle of Palms Downtown Charleston Shem Creek 
Sullivan’s Island

10 min

For a coastal afternoon with a laidback vibe, Sullivan’s delivers uncrowded beaches along with a great mix of bookstores, ice cream shops, and unpretentious seafood joints on Middle Street.

Isle of Palms

Seaside Inn is Located Here
Wide beaches, casual restaurants, and an old-school beach-town vibe define this South Carolina barrier island. Whether porch sitting or sandcastle-building, slow afternoons just make sense here. 
Downtown Charleston

30 min

Rainbow Row, the Charleston City Market, cobblestone streets, ghost tours, and horse-drawn carriages are just the beginning. It’s walkable, charming, and filled with little moments you’ll want to tuck away.

Shem Creek

16 min

Kayakers glide past shrimp boats and waterside restaurants where the catch is always fresh. Come for sunset drinks, stay for dolphin sightings and breezy, local charm.
